Arizona Winter School 2020: Nonabelian Chabauty

AWS 2020 will be held March 7-11, 2020 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Registration will open in September.
    The deadline to apply for funding is November 8, 2019.
  • Speakers:
    • Jennifer Balakrishnan: Computational tools for quadratic Chabauty
    • Minhyong Kim: Foundations of nonabelian Chabauty
    • Steffen Müller: Quadratic Chabauty
    • David Zureick-Brown: Classical Chabauty
    with Bjorn Poonen, Clay Lecturer
  • Organizers: Kiran Kedlaya, Brandon Levin, and David Zureick-Brown (main program), with Alina Bucur, Bryden Cais, Mirela Ciperiani, and Hang Xue.
